name: Endcor® 400
description: Endcor® 400 Wash Primer is a vinyl metal conditioner that eliminates the need for wash-off types of phosphoric acid pre-treatments and additional temporary “shop” coats. Endcor 400 Wash Primer --Low Flash meets U.S. Specification MIL-C-15328B Coating Pre-treatment (Formula 117 for Metals). Endcor 400 may be applied to moist or wet metal, and even under these conditions will dry within one-half hour to permit immediate application of finish coatings.
